books.title: The Great Gatsby
books.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
books.description: The Great Gatsby is a novel written by American author F. Scott Fitzgerald that follows a cast of characters living in the fictional towns of West Egg and East Egg on prosperous Long Island in the summer of 1922.

books.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
books.author: Harper Lee
books.description: To Kill a Mockingbird is a novel by Harper Lee published in 1960. It is a classic of modern American literature. The novel is renowned for its warmth and humor, despite dealing with the serious issues of rape and racial inequality.
